text: John McNaughton (19 January 1912 – 27 June 1986) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a left back in the English Football League for Nottingham Forest and Brighton & Hove Albion. ==References== Category:1912 births Category:1986 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Perth, Scotland Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Nottingham Forest F.C. players Category:Brighton & Hove Albion F.C. players Category:Scottish Junior Football Association players Category:English Football League players
title: Jock McNaughton
